posts.post_content:
offered here are both versions of the S74-2 Bresnahan . Both with mouth open and mouth closed. Both are in nice shape with mouth closed a bit nicer with excellent registration and minimal fraying . This light pink version has the Turkey Red Designation. The mouth open Bresnahan is a darker pink and also has excellent registration and color. A tad more fraying but both the factory and brand designation Old Mill are easily readable 
Bresnahan Mouth Closed $90.00 sold
Bresnahan Mouth Open $80.00 sold
